title: Sound On: Cuomo Resigns, SALT Repeal (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Cuomo Resigns, SALT Repeal (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests: New York Congressman Brian Higgins, New Jersey Congressman Josh Gottheimer and Bloomberg politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
